channel.title: Bluecore source help please?
channel.description: Yeah so umm, with paladino's source bluecore i don't know how to change rights around as i can't find char sheets, second, when in game, i can get teleport commands to work but don't know what ::item does, and finally prayer has no effect whatsoever and i can't find anywhere to buy anything, will I have to code all this in, if so please give me some useful tutorial links and a hand please, thanks for trying guys!

item.title: Bluecore source help please?
item.dc:creator: @noob_pwner noob pwner
item.description:
@noob_pwner wrote:

::item spawns an item for you, you need to use it like this:

::item ITEMID AMOUNT

Read full topic

item.title: Bluecore source help please?
item.dc:creator: @jads jads
item.description:
@jads wrote:

If you need to know how to change your rights Do the Following.

Step 1:
Go into src

Step 2:
palidino76 -> rs2 -> io -> Login.java

Step 3:
Find This:

Engine.fileManager.loadCharacter(p); if (password != null && p.password != null && p.password != "" && !p.password.equals(password)) { returnCode = 3; } else { p.password = password; }

Under That There should you should see this.
if (p.username.equals("")) {
p.rights = 2;
}
If there is a name already in there Replace it With yours.
Save Compile And run.

If You do not see,
if (p.username.equals("")) {
p.rights = 2;
}
Just simply add it in there.
Making it look like this,

Engine.fileManager.loadCharacter(p); if (password != null && p.password != null && p.password != "" && !p.password.equals(password)) { returnCode = 3; } else { p.password = password; } if (p.username.equals("YOUR-Username-Should-Go-Here")) { p.rights = 2; }

Thanks,
`Jads

Read full topic
